overview:
After graduating his Bachelor Degree he started his Master at the University of Cologne in Finance. Serdar Worked 1 year for KfW (DEG) as an assistant from a Director of the Istanbul representative Office (M&A) and 2 years for Deloitte & TouchÃ© in the Reorganisation Service. Besides that he worked as an Intern at HSH CF and collected Investment banking (M&A) further experiences. Co-Founder of Amsterdam Systems. Exit of Amsterdam Systems in March 2011. Since August 2011 Serdar is working for Union Investment

His areas of expertise include Investment banking & Consulting experience of 3 years, with focus on renewable Energy, software, internet, mobile internet, logistic and transportation, commerce and Automotive

degrees.subject: Investmentbanking & Corporate
degrees.institution: Schumpeter School of Business and Economics
